messages.title: IT’S TIME TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: For too many people, things aren’t working as they should be. Both the Conservatives and Labour are failing time and again to deliver a future... Whether it’s the Conservative's hostile environment or the Labour leadership’s failure to root out anti-Semitism, both sow fear in our communities and allow hatred to spread.

messages.title: INSIDE: JO SWINSON’S PLAN FOR OUR COUNTRY’S FUTURE
messages.content: Join Swinson's Liberal Democrats to build a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats plan to stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit. Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats plan to stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jo added, 'We will reinvent the relationship between people and the communities in which they reside, so that they are a part of the solution to our biggest challenges, not the problem. A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit and deliver a brighter future for everyone.'

contactInformation.address: Return to: Freepost RSTK-HKSH-EJGE, Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: Jo Swinson with supporters, symbolizing a collective effort to build a brighter future.
